Annotation Types Summary
Content.Searchable Specifies whether the instances of the target type should be searchable.
Renderable.ListLayout Deprecated. Use Renderer.ListLayout instead.
Renderable.ListLayouts Deprecated. Use Renderer.ListLayouts instead.
Renderer.Engine Deprecated. No replacement.
Renderer.LayoutPath Specifies the servlet path used to render instances of the target type as a page.
Renderer.ListLayout  
Renderer.ListLayouts  
Renderer.Path Specifies the servlet path used to render instances of the target type as a module.
Renderer.Script Deprecated. Use Renderer.Path instead.
Seo.DescriptionFields Specifies an array of fields that are checked to get the meta description from an instance of the target type.
Seo.KeywordsFields Specifies an array of fields that are checked to get the meta keywords from an instance of the target type.
ToolUi.CompatibleTypes Specifies an array of compatible types that the target type may switch to.
ToolUi.DropDown Specifies whether the target field should be displayed as a drop-down menu.
ToolUi.FieldDisplayType Specifies the internal type used to render the target field.
ToolUi.FieldPlaceholder Deprecated. Use ToolUi.Placeholder instead.
ToolUi.FieldSorted Specifies whether the values in the target field should be sorted before being saved.
ToolUi.FieldSuggestedMaximum Deprecated. Use ToolUi.SuggestedMaximum instead.
ToolUi.FieldSuggestedMinimum Deprecated. Use ToolUi.SuggestedMinimum instead.
ToolUi.Filterable Specifies whether the target field should be offered as a filterable field in search.
ToolUi.GlobalFilter Specifies whether the target type shows up as a filter that can be applied to any types in search.
ToolUi.Heading Specifies the text to display before the target field.
ToolUi.Hidden Specifies whether the target is hidden in the UI.
ToolUi.InputProcessorPath Specifies the path to the processor used to render and update the target field.
ToolUi.InputSearcherPath Specifies the path to the searcher used to find a value for the target field.
ToolUi.Note Specifies the note displayed along with the target in the UI.
ToolUi.NoteHtml Specifies the note, in raw HTML, displayed along with the target in the UI.
ToolUi.NoteRendererClass Specifies the class that can render the note displayed along with the target in the UI.
ToolUi.OnlyPathed Specifies whether the target field may only contain objects with paths.
ToolUi.Placeholder Specifies the target field's placeholder text.
ToolUi.ReadOnly Specifies whether the target is read-only.
ToolUi.Referenceable Specifies whether the instances of the target type can be referenced by a referential text object.
ToolUi.RichText Specifies whether the target field should offer rich-text editing options.
ToolUi.Sortable Specifies whether the target field should be offered as a sortable field in search.
ToolUi.StandardImageSizes Specifies the standard image sizes that would be applied to the target field.
ToolUi.SuggestedMaximum Specifies the suggested maximum size of the target field value.
ToolUi.SuggestedMinimum Specifies the suggested minimum size of the target field value.
ToolUi.Suggestions Specifies whether the target field should offer suggestions.
